channel.title: Please watch if you want old rs back
channel.description:
Favourited, Spammed on Runescape's Facebook page, posted thread's on Rune-server, moparscape, runelocus... YOUR﻿ TURN!!!!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1gKaFaawLkw

item.title: Please watch if you want old rs back
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Frell:

wow… has anyone looked at runescapes recent youtube videos? they’re getting showered with dislikes on every video and people are threatening to quit if combat beta goes through

They won’t quit. Those little faggots are addicted to runescape.

Read full topic
item.source: Please watch if you want old rs back

item.source: Please watch if you want old rs back

item.title: Please watch if you want old rs back
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:34, topic:450101”]Wasn’t RSC opened a while ago for members only? I managed to log in at the time and I can access RSC now at any time, can even get the cape even though my account is not made in the RSC era.

Anyways, I saw a lot of comments yesterday about making Jagex stop the Evolution of Combat update. Do you really think they will dump all the work put into it and just forget the whole idea? The update will pass just like many others have in the past that upset a few players.

Also if such server was opened, it will be full of bots. Today’s RS cannot stop them, imagine such an old revision. Unless they make it so that only accounts created between 2003-2007 can log in.[/quote]

I don’t think revision has anything to do with the level of difficulty of botting.

Read full topic
item.source: Please watch if you want old rs back

item.title: Please watch if you want old rs back
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Wasn’t RSC opened a while ago for members only? I managed to log in at the time and I can access RSC now at any time, can even get the cape even though my account is not made in the RSC era.

Anyways, I saw a lot of comments yesterday about making Jagex stop the Evolution of Combat update. Do you really think they will dump all the work put into it and just forget the whole idea? The update will pass just like many others have in the past that upset a few players.

Also if such server was opened, it will be full of bots. Today’s RS cannot stop them, imagine such an old revision. Unless they make it so that only accounts created between 2003-2007 can log in.

Read full topic
item.source: Please watch if you want old rs back

item.title: Please watch if you want old rs back
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“AlCoHoLiC, post:32, topic:450101”][quote author=Travas link=topic=552998.msg4054007#msg4054007 date=1342763728]

But couldn’t jagex real runescape in 06 like they did with RSC?

So can’t we at-least try?

It’d be closed just like RSC too.
[/quote]RSC isn’t closed at all. There are still tons and tons of people who play; the problem is, Jagex does not support the game. Large amounts of botting takes place on it, with no consequences from Jagex. People actually beg to be able to pay extra for membership just so Jagex would support it again and actually take care of it. If the 2006 server opened up, I imagine they would do the same.

theres only afew accounts that can log into rsc, rsc is closed to everyone eles.[/quote]

Not a few, but definitely a limited amount.

Read full topic
item.source: Please watch if you want old rs back

item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

I’m fine if they bring it back.

I wouldn’t forward to all the douchers who log in and spam the chat:

red:wave:W000t JAg3x U R Da BEST!!!#!$%^&#^@!#&$@@@@1

The first day it is released. That would be ridiculous.

item.title: Please watch if you want old rs back
item.dc:creator: @Rawr_lol Rawr lol
item.description:
@Rawr_lol wrote:

It was cool to watch, but Jagex would never do anything like that.

Even if Jagex did save old revisions it would take time to implement.

Time that could be used to create more micro-transaction marketing schemes.

Read full topic
item.source: Please watch if you want old rs back

item.title: Please watch if you want old rs back
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:12, topic:450101”]These type of videos always make me cringe.

Anyway, one of their lead mods (Mod Mark?) said in the past that they don’t save old copies of the game so reverting back (or putting up an older version) wouldn’t be possible. I guarantee even if it was done, it would flop hard and people would still complain about it. That being said, I kinda want to see them do it just so everyone’s nostalgia goggles get shattered.[/quote]
they don’t save old revisions? bull shit.

Read full topic
item.source: Please watch if you want old rs back

item.title: Please watch if you want old rs back
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:21, topic:450101”]unlikely, the odds of it being xp lamps is too high. Selling XP lamps would bring in tons of money by bringing their botting community back without cluttering the world.[/quote]All I can say is I really hope that doesn’t happen. My guess would be they aren’t THAT bad, but who knows.

Read full topic
item.source: Please watch if you want old rs back

item.title: Please watch if you want old rs back
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

unlikely, the odds of it being xp lamps is too high. Selling XP lamps would bring in tons of money by bringing their botting community back without cluttering the world.

item.source: Please watch if you want old rs back

item.title: Please watch if you want old rs back
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:19, topic:450101”][quote author=mihalich link=topic=552998.msg4052618#msg4052618 date=1342661789]

These type of videos always make me cringe.

Anyway, one of their lead mods (Mod Mark?) said in the past that they don’t save old copies of the game so reverting back (or putting up an older version) wouldn’t be possible. I guarantee even if it was done, it would flop hard and people would still complain about it. That being said, I kinda want to see them do it just so everyone’s nostalgia goggles get shattered.

I actually don’t mind the game right now.

My only issues is anything with exclusive ties to spending money that isn’t for membership. Thats what runescape was special for, it never felt like a gimmick.

I was actually going to renew my membership today and then I saw the soloman shop.

At the risk of starting another debate, why not renew membership? The shop doesn’t provide anything that gives extra benefits over any other member.
[/quote]
Because they have items marked as “permanent” which means theyve already planned temporary items. Im waiting to see what those are.[/quote]… or they marked them permanent to point out that they don’t go away?

Read full topic
item.source: Please watch if you want old rs back

I guarantee even if it was done, it would flop hard and people would still complain about it. That being said, I kinda want to see them do it just so everyone’s nostalgia goggles get shattered.

I actually don’t mind the game right now.

My only issues is anything with exclusive ties to spending money that isn’t for membership. Thats what runescape was special for, it never felt like a gimmick.

I was actually going to renew my membership today and then I saw the soloman shop.

[/quote]
At the risk of starting another debate, why not renew membership? The shop doesn’t provide anything that gives extra benefits over any other member.[/quote]
Because they have items marked as “permanent” which means theyve already planned temporary items. Im waiting to see what those are.

Read full topic

item.title: Please watch if you want old rs back
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

So wheres the ‘Please keep runescape the same’ video that others get to spam?

Or the “I like the majority of runescape updates; there may be a few I could do without but it’s not enough to want to go back and lose all the cool things since then”

Or even better: “Everyone has different opinions so you should just try and make the best updates possible Jagex”

Just a thought

Read full topic
